review.description: I ordered two pizzas as takeout and arrived to the restaurant on the front counter right by the door (in the cold). When I got home, I opened to the pizza box only to find my margherita pizza burnt to a crisp. It was absolutely inedible.
review.author: Chantal M.

review.description: Everything on the menu is great! You can't visit with out trying the pizza. If you are in the mood for desert check out the fried dough with Nutella.
review.author: DJ M.

review.description: The pizza is extremely delicious. The service is always great and food comes out very quickly. All of the staff is extremely warm and friendly which makes the place very inviting.
review.author: Ashley G.

review.description: Absolutely amazing. The Regina Margherita was heaven. Crust is thin and perfect, the creamy tomato sauce, mozzarella, and I added prucciuto for a ridiculously amazing pie. The only complaint is the Bloody Mary, which had basil in it, which was very unusual for me, but I still sucked it down. They topped it off with a complimentary Nutella pizza that was mind blowing and such a treat.
review.author: C. A.
